metadata.title: CVE-2012-6107 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Apache Axis2/C does not verify that the server hostname matches a domainname in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field of the X.509certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof SSL serversvia an arbitrary valid certificate.

criterions.comment: axis2c: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
